page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN OUR AREA ARE BRITISH BY BIRTH & ORIGIN. THERE ARE MANY PEOPLE WHO WERE NOT BORN IN THE AREA BUT THEY NOW CONSIDER THEMSELVES AS LOCALS. BY TAKING A SURVEY AND HAVING GROUP DISCUSSIONS WE DECIDED THAT THERE WERE SEVERAL THINGS IN COMMON WITH MOST OF OUR HOME LIFES. WE ALL HAD TELEVISION AND WATCHED IT A GREAT DEAL AND MORE THAN TWO THIRDS OF US AT SCHOOL HAD A VIDEO AT HOME. HALF OF US HAD A COMPUTER IN OUR HOME. THERE WERE TELEPHONES IN NEARLY EVERY HOUSE AND MOST OF OUR PARENTS HAD FREEZERS AND WASHING MACHINES. WE ALL HAD BREAKFAST BEFORE SCHOOL BUT THE THINGS WE HAD WERE VARIED. AT NIGHT WE ALL HAD SUPPER ALTHOUGH SOME OF US HAD MORE TO EAT BECAUSE WE ONLY HAD SANDWICHES AT SCHOOL WHEN SOME CHILDREN HAD A HOT SCHOOL LUNCH.
